articles.title: Aldi rolls out huge change to the way you shop
articles.author: Eleanor Wicklund
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its grocery delivery service in New South Wales in partnership with DoorDash, expanding the service that was already available in other states. New South Wales residents can now order over 1800 products, including groceries and household essentials, through the DoorDash app for delivery. This launch follows a successful trial in Canberra.

articles.title: From Candy Aisle to Climbing Tower, Juicy Drop® Brings Playable Flavor to Roblox  Sep. 15, 2025 22:24
articles.summary: Juicy Drop, by Bazooka Brands, launched Juicy Drop Pop-Up 2025: Tower Obby on Roblox. The Tower Obby Pop-Up reimagines Juicy Drop's signature flavor and texture mixing identity as a climbable, replayable challenge. Players can jump, balance, and bounce through four themed stages and unlocks exclusive avatar rewards.

articles.title: This budget-friendly moisturizer will make your face look rich — now 63% off
articles.author: Holly J Coley
articles.summary: Neutrogena is offering its Hydro Boost Water Gel at a 63% discount. This water-based formula, infused with hyaluronic acid, locks in moisture for 24 hours, plumping and smoothing the skin. It is fragrance-free and fast-absorbing, making it an ideal alternative to oil-based serums and expensive creams.

articles.title: Aldi Australia now offers national delivery
articles.author: SHARON HUNT
articles.summary: Aldi has partnered with DoorDash to launch a new on-demand grocery delivery service nationwide in Australia. Customers can order groceries through the DoorDash app or website and have them delivered to their door, with options for immediate or scheduled delivery. Everyday essentials like fresh produce, milk, and eggs are among the most popular online purchases.

articles.title: I tested supermarket own brand honey – delicious winner can boost your sex drive and only cost £1.75
articles.author: Laura Stott
articles.summary: Lidl offers Maribel Runny Honey, a multi-purpose sweetener. Asda sells Hilltop Blossom Honey with a smooth consistency. Tesco provides Clear Honey as a versatile sugar alternative. Morrisons offers Pure Clear Honey with a robust flavor. Marks and Spencer sells Pure Honey collected from hives in Turkey, Mexico and Argentina. Rowse Runny Honey is available at Sainsbury's with a silky texture. Sainsbury's also offers Clear Honey with a pure flavor and great texture and Co-op offers Squeezy Clear Honey.

articles.title: Switch 2 for sale: Price cut for Nintendo's new console, but act quickly
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Walmart is having a sale on the Nintendo Switch 2 console, which features a 7.9-inch HDR touchscreen display capable of 1080p resolution and up to a 120 fps refresh rate. The console also includes Next-Gen Joy-Con 2 controllers with a 'mouse-mode functionality'.

articles.title: Trader Joe's New Freezer Dessert Is a Bite-Size Take on a Japanese Favorite
articles.author: Fred Hernandez
articles.summary: Trader Joe's has re-introduced their limited-time Japanese Mini Taiyaki, custard-filled pastries shaped like fish, to the freezer aisle for $4.99. The product features a crisp shell and creamy custard filling and is inspired by a popular Japanese street food.

articles.title: A Massive Criticism Following the Mega Flop: Mega Flop Sparks Public Outcry
articles.summary: Princess Madeleine launched her skincare line in Lyko stores in Sweden, but the launch reportedly experienced a slow start with modest turnout. The brand previously faced criticism for its collaboration with Weleda and concerns about promotional content disclosure. Initial reports suggest a less-than-enthusiastic response from shoppers.

articles.title: Avilanian entities protecting the ozone layer to be recognised
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: Apple has announced the launch of the iPhone 15 series, which features the A17 Bionic chip and an enhanced camera system. They also unveiled the Apple Watch Series 9, showcasing a brighter display, a new S9 SiP, and a double tap gesture. The iPhone 15 starts at $799, and the Apple Watch Series 9 starts at $399.

articles.title: Anycrap store offers AI slop products you can't buy
articles.author: Rob Beschizza
articles.summary: Anycrap utilizes AI image generators to create a fake online store filled with AI-generated products. This demonstrates a novel application of AI in product design and conceptualization, showcasing potential use cases in generating product ideas and visuals.

articles.title: Market 32 Kicks Off ‘10 Years Fresh' Initiative With Savings For Shoppers, Commitment To Local Growth
articles.author: Evesun
articles.summary: Market 32 and Price Chopper are launching a '10 Years Fresh' campaign to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the first Market 32 store. The campaign will run for 10 weeks and include special savings, product giveaways (PICS product), and opportunities to win free groceries, along with expanded multicultural offerings.

articles.title: Taco John's Continues Legacy of Unbeatable Value with Launch of Jr. Crispy Chicken Wraps for ...
articles.author: Taco John's
articles.summary: Taco John's has introduced new Jr. Crispy Chicken Wraps, available in Ranch and Spicy flavors, featuring crispy all-white-meat chicken, lettuce, shredded cheese, and sauces wrapped in a flour tortilla. This launch aims to provide guests with craveable and affordable options.

articles.title: Japan's Futuristic ‘Human Washing Machine' Is Absurd and We Must Try It
articles.summary: Science Co. has updated and reintroduced the "Human Washing Machine of the Future," originally showcased by Sanyo Electric Co. (now Panasonic Holdings Corp.) in 1970. This enclosed bath and shower system uses mist, bubbles, and sensors to provide a relaxing and thorough cleaning experience, complete with soothing music and videos.

articles.title: Hoff & Mazor Unveils Enhanced Website and Expanded Service Depth
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Hoff & Mazor, a mobile app development firm, launched a redesigned website featuring clearer service descriptions and expanded expertise in mobile, cross-platform, and enterprise apps. The website showcases a refreshed design and reorganized navigation, highlighting services like native iOS and Android app development, NFT app development and enhanced portfolio examples, to improve the user experience and transparency. The redesigned website puts better emphasis on cross-platform and enterprise app solutions, wearable technologies, and NFT development.

articles.title: 'Whole' lot of trendy food
articles.author: 민법 교수의 부동산 처방전
articles.summary: CU, a convenience store chain, has launched 'K-Tong Bulgogi Gimbap,' a new snack designed for a single bite. This product is inspired by a viral scene from Netflix's 'KPop Demon Hunters,' which led to the 'One-Bite Gimbap Challenge' and numerous memes.

articles.title: Golden Gate Publishers Emerges as the Top Choice for Independent Authors
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Golden Gate Publishers empowers independent authors through a range of services including editing, design, marketing, and distribution. The company's structured approach, transparency, and flexible service models distinguish it in the publishing industry by offering tailored solutions and a full spectrum of support for authors seeking professionalism without sacrificing independence. Golden Gate Publishers is based in San Francisco, California.

articles.title: LG EXPANDS XBOOM BUDS LINEUP WITH BUDS PLUS AND BUDS LITE FOR EVERY LIFESTYLE
articles.author: LG Electronics USA
articles.summary: LG Electronics is expanding its xboom Buds lineup with the introduction of Buds Plus and Buds Lite, building upon the original xboom Buds. These new models are designed to deliver high-quality audio with immersive sound, extended battery life, and ergonomic comfort for both casual listeners and audiophiles.

articles.title: I'm Extremely Picky About My Pens. After Years of Testing, I Have 10 Favorites.
articles.author: Martha Tuber
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews a variety of pens, highlighting their features and benefits. It showcases brands such as Anterique with its smooth-flowing, smudge-free ballpoint pen, BiC Cristal, recognized for its balance of form and function, and Pilot Juice-Up gel pen which handles like a rollerball. It also mentions other brands like Sakura, Faber-Castell and PaperMate.

articles.title: From 3D pens to cameras for kids, how myFirst brand connects safety and creativity
articles.author: Mae Cornes
articles.summary: Singapore startup myFirst has launched three new products: the myFirst Camera 50, an AI-powered digital camcorder; the myFirst 3dPen Artist, a kid-safe 3D printing pen; and the myFirst Fone R2, a kids smartwatch with GPS tracking and video calling. These devices are designed to be part of a seamless ecosystem of technology for kids, focusing on innovation, safety, and fun, and are aimed at addressing parental concerns about screen time and content safety.

articles.title: Aldi intensifies war with Coles, Woolworths with major move from today
articles.author: Stewart Perrie
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its grocery delivery service in New South Wales through a partnership with DoorDash, allowing residents to order from over 1,800 supermarket items. While prices may be slightly higher than in-store due to service and delivery fees, Aldi aims to remain the most affordable online supermarket option.

articles.title: I tried the new Chick N Dip brand exclusive to the North West
articles.author: Christopher Megrath
articles.summary: Domino's has launched Chick N Dip, a new sub-brand focused on chicken items and seven new sauce flavors, exclusively in England's North West and Northern Ireland. Chick N Dip's menu includes tenders, wings, and boneless bites, complemented by sauces like teriyaki, ghost chilli glaze, and hot honey, available through Domino's website.

articles.title: Messy's 'Magic In A Bottle' Treatment Revived My Grossest Hair Day
articles.author: Zoe Weiner
articles.summary: Alli Webb, the founder of DryBar, launched Messy, a new venture focused on embracing natural hair, and introduced the 'I Am Transformed' Instant Silk Revival Treatment. This product, designed to revive dirty hair, is a mist that reduces frizz, boosts moisture and shine, and adds texture. The treatment contains vegan silk and Soft Touch Memory Technology to lock in moisture, smooth frizz, and provide flexible hold.

articles.title: The Pixel 10's Daily Hub is gone, so here's how to make your own
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Google paused the rollout of the Daily Hub preview on the Pixel 10. The Pixel 10 features Google's Tensor G5 chip and a three-camera setup, including a 10.8-megapixel telephoto camera. The Daily Hub aimed to consolidate information from Google services like Gmail, Calendar, and Fitbit into a central hub.

articles.title: South African Woman's Stunning Blonde Synthetic Wig Purchase Exceeds Expectations, Mzansi Reacts
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: A woman purchased a long blonde synthetic wig online, exceeding her expectations. The wig, purchased from Shein, looked natural and stunning, enhancing her overall look. The post gained traction, with users praising the wig's quality and asking about maintenance.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Cover for a Duvet/Quilt (BRA-1268)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has developed the DOONA SANDWICH, an improved duvet/quilt cover designed for easier changing, saving time and effort. The design is available for licensing or sale through InventHelp to manufacturers or marketers.

articles.title: This New Pea Protein Powder Can Replace Eggs in Baking and Cut Costs
articles.author: Parker Johnson
articles.summary: Meala has launched Groundbaker, an egg replacer derived from pea protein designed as a one-to-one substitute for eggs in baked goods. This single-ingredient product aims to reduce baking costs and offer a clean label alternative free from common allergens. Meala states that its pea protein powder is formulated to mimic the primary functions of eggs in baking.

articles.title: Aitu: Empowered by AI, the future of Indonesia's textile and garment industry has arrived.
articles.summary: Aitu brand launched globally on September 23rd with AI-powered smart manufacturing solutions for the garment industry. Aitu won the "2025 Global Product Technology Innovation Awards" for integrating AI with garment manufacturing. The company aims to improve production efficiency and quality for the garment manufacturing industry with this solution.

articles.title: China launches SUV with gold logo
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: BYD has unveiled its new luxury flagship crossover, the Yangwang U8L, in China. The U8L is a full-size SUV featuring a hybrid powertrain producing 1,180 horsepower, premium design elements like a 24-carat gold Oracle emblem, and a starting price of 1.28 million yuan.

articles.title: Create Stunning Images with Google Gemini AI Photo: A Step-by-Step Guide
articles.author: newsdesk
articles.summary: Google launched Gemini AI Photo, an AI-powered tool designed for generating high-quality, customizable images. Gemini AI Photo allows users to create visuals for various purposes, including social media, presentations, and blogs, using text prompts and customizable style options.

articles.title: PhotoRoom launches background-removal app on Android
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: PhotoRoom, a French startup, is launching its utility photography app on Android. The app allows users to remove and swap photo backgrounds and tweak photos. The company previously launched the app on iOS.

articles.title: The viral Dyson Supersonic Nural hair dryer is on sale this week
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $100 discount on the Supersonic Nural hair dryer, reducing the price to $450 for the Vinca Blue/Topaz version. The Supersonic Nural is an updated version of the original Supersonic hair dryer and uses 'Nural' sensors to automatically adjust airflow and temperature.

articles.title: Infinix expands retail footprint in Nigeria with Abuja store launch
articles.author: Ojochenemi Onje
articles.summary: Infinix launched the GT 30 Pro, a gaming-focused smartphone, during the opening of its new flagship retail store in Abuja. The GT 30 Pro features a Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, 3D Vapour Cooling, a 1.5K 144Hz AMOLED display, GT triggers, JBL dual speakers, a 108MP AI camera, and a 5500mAh battery, with only 30 units available in Nigeria.

articles.title: USA TODAY implements AI answer engine DeeperDive for all users
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Gannett has fully implemented DeeperDive, a generative AI engine created by Taboola, for USA TODAY's audience. This new service delivers GenAI conversations to readers using content from the USA TODAY Network. In the future, AI agents will be tested to provide readers with purchasing options tailored to their needs.

articles.title: LambdaTest Introduces General Availability to KaneAI to Democratize AI-Native Test Automation
articles.summary: LambdaTest launched the general availability of KaneAI, an AI-native test authoring solution. This allows users to plan, author, and evolve end-to-end tests using natural language processing on web and native Android and iOS applications. Teams can also use 300 minutes of LambdaTest's HyperExecute platform for efficient test execution.

articles.title: fullthrottle.ai® Unveils Enhanced Platform to Simplify AdTech for Small and Mid-Sized Marketers
articles.author: Full Throttle Technologies
articles.summary: FullThrottle Technologies launched a newly enhanced first-party data platform, fullthrottle.ai, designed for enterprise-grade campaign planning, omnichannel activation, and real-time outcome measurement. This platform is built for small and mid-sized businesses and provides a unified solution to identify high-intent audiences and track performance.

articles.title: Dear Hannah Prep is a Tweenage Dream
articles.author: Caitlin Clark
articles.summary: Dear Hannah Prep, a tween-focused offshoot of Dallas' Dear Hannah boutique, opened in October 2023. The boutique sells items like bows, charm bracelets, and smiley faces, targeting a young audience and capitalizing on the "preppy" trend popularized on TikTok.

articles.title: DJI Mini 5 Pro Leaks Reveal New Images, Unboxing Videos—But When Is Its Official Release?
articles.author: Isaiah Richard
articles.summary: DJI's upcoming Mini 5 Pro drone has leaked online, revealing new images and unboxing videos. The drone is rumored to have new camera features.  However, DJI has not yet announced a release date.

articles.title: Oppo F31, F31 Pro, F31 Pro+ series with 7000mAh battery unveiled
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Oppo launched a new line of products on Monday, September 15th.

articles.title: Tecno Pop 8 Review: Specs and Price in Nigeria (2025)
articles.summary: Tecno launched the Pop 8, a budget-friendly smartphone aimed at students and first-time users. The phone features a 6.6-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate, a 5,000mAh battery, and runs on Android 13 (Go Edition) with Tecno's HiOS 13 skin. It is powered by a Unisoc T606 processor and includes a 13MP main camera.

articles.title: Claytis
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Claytis.com launched a new technology platform powered by Claytis Global Technology Ltd. designed for brand protection and SEO. This platform helps manage and protect trademarks, service marks, logos, and brand names. Also, Mercari launched an anti-counterfeit campaign.

articles.title: What's new: Logistics provider hiring 375; bargain retailer coming to Riverside
articles.author: Samantha Gowen
articles.summary: Drybar, a salon specializing in blowouts and hairstyles, opened a new location in Corona. GMD Stores leased its first brick-and-mortar store in Southern California, planning to open in Riverside offering housewares, decor, and makeup.

articles.title: Best Walmart vacuum deal: Dyson Big Ball Turbinehead for $229.99 shipped free
articles.author: Ashley Dill
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a flash deal and rollback on the Dyson Big Ball Turbinehead Canister Vacuum, pricing it at $229.99 (originally $379.99) with free shipping. The Dyson vacuum features powerful suction, a self-righting design, HEPA filtration, and multiple attachments for versatile cleaning.

articles.title: This Version of Microsoft Office Provides the Tools You Need for a Whole Lot Less
articles.author: PC Mag
articles.summary: Microsoft 365 users may notice differences in updated versions of the applications. These updated versions function the same but without AI suggestions.

articles.title: Ubersuggest Puts AI Search Power in Every Marketer's Hands with New Features
articles.author: Ubersuggest
articles.summary: NP Digital's Ubersuggest, an AI-first SEO platform, has expanded its feature set by integrating AI Search Optimization insights. This update provides marketers with AI visibility, sentiment analysis, and competitive intelligence tools within the Ubersuggest dashboard, offering a holistic view of brand presence across traditional and AI-driven search.

articles.title: Simon AI Launches Agentic Marketing Platform to Unlock Data for Contextual Personalization
articles.author: Simon Data
articles.summary: Simon AI launched the Simon AI™ Agentic Marketing Platform on September 15, 2025. This platform empowers marketing teams to leverage live customer and contextual data for adaptive campaigns, aiming to improve conversion rates, customer lifetime value, and measurable growth.

articles.title: Shoppers find clever ‘space saving' hack that's ideal for drying clothes
articles.author: JOE
articles.summary: The Gr8 Home Telescopic Over the Bath Tub Clothes Airer, available on Amazon for €28.91, is a space-saving and extendable clothes drying rack designed to fit over most bath sizes. It holds up to 10kg of clothes, folds easily for storage, and has received positive reviews for its versatility and practicality in helping to avoid mould.

articles.title: 经典音游《啪嗒砰》精神续作《啦嗒铛》上架，Steam 国区92元_手机网易网
articles.author: IT之家
org: IT之家附游戏商品页如下（
articles.summary: Ratatan, a spiritual successor to the Patapon rhythm game, is launching its early access version on Steam for 92 yuan on September 19th. The game will receive updates in the coming months, including new skills, character growth features, UI/UX improvements, new story content, and eventually, new levels, bosses, and console support.

articles.title: Hair dryers from drones and makeup mirrors from movie animators: How L'Oréal makes open innovation work
articles.author: Adam Gale
articles.summary: L'Oréal, recognized as Europe's Most Innovative Company, launched 'Makeup Genius' (now 'Beauty Genius') in 2014, an augmented reality application. This service allows consumers to virtually try on makeup, visualizing products on their skin before making a purchase, marking the beauty industry's first use of augmented reality.

articles.title: 28 Miracle Products Reviewers Say They'll Use 'Forever'
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Several new products are being introduced, including Secret deodorant providing 72-hour protection, a long-lasting mascara for bold lashes, and natural nail and cuticle repair oil. Also featured is dandruff shampoo formulated with ketoconazole, and Feed-N-Wax wood polish and conditioner, along with Elizavecca pore control serum and extreme hold tinted eyebrow gel.

articles.title: Kyndryl and VML Announce AI-Driven Partnership
articles.author: Maham Fatima
articles.summary: Kyndryl and VML have announced a global partnership to reimagine customer experiences using AI, data, and modern infrastructure. This collaboration will combine Kyndryl's services, including Kyndryl Consult and Kyndryl Vital, with VML Enterprise Solutions' expertise to deliver scalable, AI-driven solutions for personalized banking and omnichannel commerce.

articles.title: Cyera Strengthens AWS Relationship With Generative AI Competency and New AWS Marketplace Listing in AI Agents & Tools
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cyera has launched its data security platform in the AI Agents and Tools section of the AWS Marketplace, accessible via its DataPort MCP interface. Cyera also achieved the AWS Generative AI Competency in security. This allows customers to discover, buy, and deploy AI agent solutions for enterprise data protection.

articles.title: Anjelic Announces Accessible Beauty Essentials
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Anjelic, a beauty company founded by Antonio Moreno, has launched a new beauty platform providing accessible and high-quality beauty essentials. The platform aims to serve both younger and older generations, offering a simplified shopping experience through its online store, shopanjelic.com. The brand emphasizes sustainability and creating lasting value.

articles.title: Pinkfish Brings Retail-Ready AI Agents to Market to Automate Core Commerce Workflows
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Pinkfish launched retail-ready AI agents to automate workflows for retail teams. These agents are pre-configured for marketing, merchandising, and commerce operations, providing a low-friction AI adoption path for retailers.

articles.title: Anjelic Announces Accessible Beauty Essentials
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Anjelic, a beauty company founded by Antonio Moreno, has launched a platform to provide high-quality beauty essentials at accessible prices. The platform aims to redefine the everyday beauty experience by making products easier to access without compromising quality.

articles.title: How to Highlight Business Offers with AI Voice Generator in CapCut Desktop Video Editor
articles.author: Gk News Service
articles.summary: CapCut Desktop Video Editor introduces the AI Voice Generator, a new service that transforms written scripts into engaging voiceovers for promotional videos. This feature offers various voice styles, adjustable speed and pitch, and multilingual capabilities to enhance marketing efforts and customer engagement. The service aims to provide a professional, efficient, and privacy-conscious solution for businesses to create compelling audio content, enabling them to effectively communicate offers and increase business results.

articles.title: Laundromat chain offering free laundry all week long
articles.author: Katie Copeland
articles.summary: Best Wash Laundromats is celebrating the grand opening of its five remodeled locations with 'Free Wash Week,' offering free laundry services from Monday to Friday. They are also holding a ribbon-cutting ceremony at their Mendenhall location on Monday at 11 a.m.

articles.title: New innovative HP printer could be boon for businesses Printing innovative
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: HP has launched the HP Neverstop Laser printer. This new printer features an innovative design and a high-capacity toner tank. It is designed to be environmentally friendly.

articles.title: My Marketing Pro Launches the First AI-Driven Platform to Unify Brand-Building and Direct Marketing
articles.author: My Marketing Pro
articles.summary: My Marketing Pro launches an AI-powered connected media platform that unifies AI-powered mass awareness with precision direct marketing. This new service aims to provide businesses and growth-oriented brands with enterprise-level intelligence, efficiency, and reach at an affordable cost.

articles.title: If You're Always Saying "I Won't Be Home Until Late," These 27 Products Belong In Your Bag
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of several new products including the Touchland Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer, Revlon oil-absorbing volcanic face roller, Loops Engage 2 ear plugs, I Dew Care's dry shampoo powder, E.l.f.'s Hydrating Core Lip Shine, mini Kindle, and Naked Sundays CabanaClear SPF 50 Water Gel Serum.

articles.title: AI-Powered Wearables Transform How Consumers Interact with Everyday Technology
articles.author: Network News Wire
articles.summary: Wearable Devices Ltd. has introduced two flagship products: the Mudra Band, a smart band for the Apple Watch, and the Mudra Link, a versatile platform designed for cross-ecosystem users seeking a frictionless, gesture-based input solution. These AI-powered, touchless sensing wearables are designed to provide intuitive device control.

articles.title: Shark's new cleaning tool tackles tough stains in 'less than a minute'
articles.author: Daily Express
articles.summary: Shark introduced a new stain-cleaning tool designed to tackle tough stains, including red wine.

articles.title: Lady Gaga covers herself from head to toe in nude paint as she promotes her ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Lady Gaga promoted a new range of foundation. House Labs launched the new foundation range. Lady Gaga founded House Labs.

articles.title: Samsung's newest tablet drops in price with rare cashback offer
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite on September 5, featuring a 10.9" display with a 90Hz refresh rate and Galaxy AI features. It also launched Galaxy Tab S11 and Tab S11 Ultra. Amazon offers a discount on these models. The Tab S10 Lite includes an S Pen stylus, differentiating it from Apple's iPad.

articles.title: Seal APK Download Latest Version (Official) 2025 For Android
articles.author: Hans India Digital
articles.summary: Seal APK is presented as a powerful and versatile application package for Android devices that allows direct installation of apps outside the Google Play Store. It offers features like enhanced customization, offline functionality, regular updates, multi-language support, and integration with other apps, providing users with greater control and flexibility. Users can download and install it after enabling 'Unknown Sources' in settings.

articles.title: This espresso machine brings cafe-style coffee to small kitchens
articles.author: Emma Henderson
articles.summary: Breville has launched the Slimline Barista VCF185, a compact espresso machine designed for small kitchens and beginner users. The machine features a straightforward design with three buttons, a dial for selecting single or double espresso shots, and a steam wand for making milk-based drinks. It is praised for its ease of use, consistent crema production, and easy cleaning process.

articles.title: 41 Budget-Friendly But Still Super Aesthetic Products
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: The article highlights affordable alternatives to popular products and brands. Dossier's "Ambery Vanilla" perfume is presented as a cost-effective option resembling YSL's Black Opium. Additionally, the article showcases products inspired by brands like Skims, Lululemon, and Barefoot Dreams, offering consumers new and budget-friendly options.

articles.title: Apple iPhone Air vs Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Who made the better slim phone
articles.summary: Apple announced the iPhone Air, a 5.6mm thin smartphone. Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge in May, another thin phone.

articles.title: 32 Products So Unique That There's Really Nothing Else Like Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: EOS launched a limited-edition Eos Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Vlasic introduced Pickle Balls, a flavored puff. NeeDoh unveiled SplootSplat, a bendy fidget toy. McCormick launched Potato Topping Seasoning. Nyx introduced "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm made with mochi rice powder. Built launched "Puff Protein Bars".

articles.title: Ai+ Smartphone Lights Up Flipkart's Big Billion Days With Exclusive Festive Offers
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Ai+ Smartphone will debut on Flipkart's Big Billion Days sale with early access on September 23, 2025, for Flipkart Plus and Black members. Available at special festive pricing, the phone features a 5000mAh battery, 50MP AI camera, and HD+ display. It offers two models: Ai+ Pulse (4G) and Ai+ Nova (5G), with varying processors and refresh rates.

articles.title: Beyond Personalization: The Rise Of Predictive AI Personas
articles.author: Dr. Bin Tang
articles.summary: Noah Digital introduces predictive AI personas, dynamic data-driven customer profiles, that evolve based on real-time behavioral insights using sophisticated algorithms and machine learning models to analyze vast amounts of customer data and forecast future actions. Businesses can leverage predictive AI to enhance marketing funnels by creating content that speaks to customers' current state and anticipating future needs, modifying advertisements in real time based on anticipated customer behavior changes, and identifying customers at risk of churning.

articles.title: True Unveils Futuristic Branding Shop at Dusit Central Park
articles.summary: True Corporation has launched its newly designed 'True Branding Shop' and 'TrueSphere' at Dusit Central Park. The shop features AI technologies, sustainable design, a Generative AI Photobooth, and offers smart devices, lifestyle gadgets, IoT equipment, and smart-home solutions. TrueSphere offers a co-working space inspired by premium airport lounges.

articles.title: The best experience design of 2025
articles.author: The experience
articles.summary: Zulu Alpha Kilo created Art Rate Monitor, an interactive platform designed to allow visitors to observe their physiological reactions to exhibits at the Art Gallery of Ontario. This platform was recognized as a winner in Fast Company's Innovation by Design Awards, specifically in the experience design category, which honors spaces, systems, or products that deliver an innovative user experience.

articles.title: 16 projects that exemplify excellence in design
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Logitech launched the Logitech G Astro A50 (Gen 5). Bugaboo introduced Bugaboo Kangaroo. PacBio released Vega. The New York Times released a redesigned app. Oxo released Rapid Brewer.

articles.title: Canva wants to own your workflow, and soon it just might
articles.author: Listen to
articles.summary: Canva launched Visual Suite 2.0 with a focus on unifying the creative process across various formats like documents, videos, and presentations, enabling seamless collaboration. This update includes AI-powered tools like Magic Resize and Magic Insights, which have been used extensively. Since its launch, Canva has seen increased user engagement, with a significant percentage of users returning to the platform and a high rate of new designs being created.

articles.title: The best user experience design of 2025
articles.author: The user
articles.summary: Adobe launched Photoshop mobile, a new mobile app designed to provide full Photoshop capabilities to users who want to create and edit designs on the go. The app was the winner of Fast Company's Innovation by Design Awards in the user experience category.

articles.title: 'We're Only Here for the Bags': KZN Couple's Shopping Haul, SA Raves About Woolies Shopping Bags
articles.author: Bongiwe Mati
articles.summary: Woolworths has launched a new concept store in Ballito featuring reusable shopping bags with silver foil lining to keep food fresh. Customers are praising the shopping bags and baby food range, and many are requesting the waffle fries to be available in more stores.

articles.title: The best beauty advent calendars for Christmas 2025: Quick! Shop now before they sell out, starting at £48
articles.author: Lia Mappoura
articles.summary: Several companies, including Liberty, Space NK, Charlotte Tilbury, Selfridges, Cult Beauty, ASOS, LUSH, Boots, Soap & Glory, Harrods, ELEMIS, No7, Benefit, Revolution Beauty, Rituals, Harvey Nichols, Anthropologie, Sculpted by Aimee, LookFantastic, Sephora, MAC, NEOM, GlossyBox, and Jo Malone, are launching beauty advent calendars for 2025. These calendars feature a variety of beauty products, with varying prices, release dates, and product selections, offering a wide range of options for consumers looking to stock up on beauty goodies for the festive season.

articles.title: Best baby mobiles
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The article highlights the Tiny Love Meadow Days Baby Mobile as a versatile option with colorful toys, motion, and music. It also presents Carter's Sea Collection Musical Mobile with sea creatures and lullabies. The mobiles aim to provide entertainment and stimulation for babies.

articles.title: M&S mattress protector that 'stays in place' now 40% off
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: M&S is offering a discounted M&S Collection Touch of Silk mattress protector, available exclusively online in four sizes. The protector features a silk and polyester filling, fits mattresses up to 30cm deep, and is machine washable.

articles.title: 29 Things That'll Help You Get Ready In Half The Time
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced and highlighted in the article. These include a microfiber hair towel and scrunchie, a wrinkle releaser spray, body sponges and wipes, hair styling tools like the Kitsch heatless curler and Revlon hair dryer, and skincare items like tinted lip balm and Lumi Glotion. These products are available on platforms like Amazon and Etsy, offering solutions for various beauty and personal care needs.

articles.title: No TV, No Print! Myntra and SUGAR bet fully on digital with Molten beauty
articles.author: Sandhi Sarun 15
articles.summary: Myntra and SUGAR Cosmetics have launched Molten Beauty, a new skincare and makeup brand targeting Gen Z consumers, exclusively on Myntra and www.moltenbeauty.com. The brand emphasizes a 'skin-first' hybrid philosophy, combining active ingredients with playful colors, and will have over 50 SKUs within a year. Myntra will offer hyper-speed delivery through its M-Now service.

articles.title: Burger King has a new £11 'gourmet' burger and Gordon Ramsay has put his name to it
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Burger King has launched a new Wagyu beef burger, priced at £11 for the burger alone or £14.50 for a meal. The burger consists of British flame-grilled Wagyu beef topped with various onions, rocket, and caramelized onion mayo, served in a brioche bun. Initial online reviews are mixed, with some praising its succulence and others finding it dry and overpriced.

articles.title: Anycrap store offers AI slop products you can't buy
articles.author: Rob Beschizza
articles.summary: Anycrap, a fictional online store, showcases AI-generated products. One notable product is 'Real Unicorn Miniature Called Luna', a creature capable of making pizza. Wlad created the site.

articles.title: How to use AI in digital marketing, according to major brands
articles.author: Lynette Dicey
articles.summary: Sanlam is using AI to optimize marketing campaigns, exemplified by their humorous 'F-word campaign'. By consolidating data and utilizing Performance Max, they have achieved a 72% reduction in cost per lead. This demonstrates the introduction of AI-driven strategies to enhance marketing efforts and improve efficiency.

articles.title: Oppo F31 Series launched in India: Check price, specs and other details
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Oppo launched the F Series in India. The launch includes details about the price and specifications of the product line.

articles.title: How packaging can become a measurable growth engine
articles.author: Oumar Fofana
articles.summary: A beverage brand introduced QR codes on its packaging directing consumers to personalized recipes, leading to a 35% increase in app downloads and a 20% boost in sales. A beauty brand utilized NFC tags to educate customers about sustainable ingredient sourcing, increasing positive brand sentiment by 40% and resulting in a 15% growth in repeat purchases. These examples demonstrate how connected packaging can be a measurable growth engine and how packaging service can be updated or changed to gain profit.

articles.title: vivo Pakistan Teases Arrival of V60: A New Chapter in Portrait Photography Begins
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: vivo Pakistan is preparing to launch the vivo V60, a new flagship phone in its V Series. The V60 features a camera co-engineered with ZEISS for enhanced portrait capabilities, a design inspired by nature (Mist Gray and Desert Gold), best-in-class dust and water resistance, a large battery, and FlashCharge technology.

articles.title: 28 Things That Will Probably Make You Think 'This Is What I've Been Waiting For' As Soon As You Try Them
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduces a hypoallergenic neck and chest cream designed to firm up skin, improving texture and elasticity. Wet & Forget launches a bleach-free shower cleaner that prevents soap scum buildup with minimal effort. Laneige introduces Neo Blurring Powder compact which is designed to eliminate oily shine without sacrificing the lit-from-within glow.

articles.title: LaCie's Iconic Rugged Drive SSD Now Faster Than Ever
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Seagate has launched the LaCie Rugged SSD4, an updated version of the Rugged Mini SSD. The new SSD boasts faster transfer speeds (up to 40Gbps), a brushed aluminum finish, and comes in 1TB, 2TB, and 4TB sizes, priced at $134.99, $249.99, and $479.99 respectively.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Novato Planning Commission greenlights new storage complex
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network and is now recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest. This investment aims to enhance connectivity from big cities to small towns.

articles.title: Skoda Kylaq Review: Premium SUV with Power, Style & Performance Tested
articles.summary: Skoda has introduced the Kylaq, a premium SUV designed to excel in design, comfort, and performance. The Kylaq features luxurious interiors, refined build quality, powerful engine options, advanced tech, and a spacious cabin. It aims to compete strongly in the SUV segment against rivals like Kia Syros, Tata Nexon, and Maruti Brezza.

articles.title: Campaign Sync Challenges: Inviting Audiences to Lip Sync Your Slogan Or Tagline
articles.author: Thandiubani
articles.summary: Pippit, an AI video generator, enables companies to launch lip sync challenges using brand slogans. This facilitates increased user engagement and memorability by turning slogans into shareable content. Pippit offers features like syncing tags with avatars and multilingual capabilities to create authentic and global campaigns.

articles.title: The SSD version of LaCie's iconic Rugged drive gets a speed boost
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Seagate has launched the updated LaCie Rugged SSD4, available in 1TB, 2TB, and 4TB capacities, with a brushed aluminum finish, centered USB-C port, and transfer speeds up to 40Gbps. The Rugged SSD4 is IP54 rated for dust and water resistance and drop protection.

articles.title: Gartner Unveils Top Emerging Technologies to Support Autonomous Business
articles.summary: Gartner, Inc. has unveiled the 2025 Hype Cycle for Emerging Technologies, highlighting innovations like machine customers, AI agents, decision intelligence, and programmable money. These technologies aim to support the new autonomous business era, offering opportunities for competitive differentiation and new growth.

articles.title: Unveiling a New Infinity: VOOPOO's Next Chapter Starts at InterTabac 2025
articles.author: Shenzhen VOOPOO Technology Co.
articles.summary: VOOPOO is set to unveil its latest product series at InterTabac 2025, which includes the acclaimed ARGUS G3 with iCOSM CODE 2.0 technology. Attendees will get an exclusive first look at new products including high-performance Pod Mods from the DRAG series and new additions to the ARGUS and VINCI series. The company is also launching a comprehensive brand refresh and upgrade.

articles.title: Azentio reimagines speed and personalization for retail, Small and Medium Enterprises (SME), and corporate lenders ...
articles.author: APO
articles.summary: Azentio Software launched Azentio Loan Origination, a next-generation product designed to help financial institutions scale credit. This launch aims to provide seamless digital experiences for banks navigating complex regulatory environments.

articles.title: Matt Preston's retro pantry ingredient for the best cheat's salad dressing
articles.author: Carissa Dragatogiannis
articles.summary: Matt Preston reveals that Maggi original seasoning liquid can be used as a secret ingredient for salad dressing, adding umami and richness. The seasoning is also highlighted as a suitable replacement for soy sauce, providing a similar flavour profile.

articles.title: Central Retail Elevates Customer Focus with Five Insights
org: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited
articles.summary: Central Retail introduces several new products and services to cater to evolving customer needs. These include the AI-powered ChefBot at TOPS, the expansion of Auto1 car service centers, hybrid TOPS DAILY formats with premium zones, and the growth of GO WHOLESALE into the B2B food sector. These initiatives aim to enhance customer convenience, personalization, and access to a wider range of products and services.

articles.title: StarHub launches real-time ad replacement on live TV
articles.summary: StarHub has launched Dynamic Ad Pods, Singapore's first solution for real-time ad replacement within live broadcast TV channels. This service allows for precision targeting during live programmes, providing new opportunities for advertisers and a more relevant viewing experience.

articles.title: From Candy Aisle to Climbing Tower, Juicy Drop® Brings Playable Flavor to Roblox
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Juicy Drop, in partnership with Super League and Beacon Media Group, has launched "Juicy Drop Pop-Up 2025: Tower Obby", its first gaming experience on Roblox. The Tower Obby allows players to mix virtual Juicy Drop products and unlock exclusive avatar rewards. It encourages players to share their experiences on social media.

articles.title: Ubersuggest Puts AI Search Power in Every Marketer's Hands with New Features
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Ubersuggest, an SEO platform from NP Digital, has launched AI Search Optimization, integrating AI search insights into its suite of SEO tools. This new feature helps marketers optimize visibility across conversational search engines by offering AI visibility, sentiment, and competitive intelligence tools. Users can access these features through a free Ubersuggest account or paid plans.

articles.title: Create free retro AI photos with Google Gemini: Step-by-step guide, Bollywood, vintage style and dandiya look prompts
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google Gemini allows users to create retro-style images using AI by uploading a photo, describing the desired retro look, and refining the details. Users can refine the image by providing more details or requesting specific changes. Once the user is satisfied with the result, they can save the image to their device.

articles.title: Google Gemini Photos Trend : हिरो-हिरोईनलाही टाकाल मागे, गुगल जेमिनीचे 10 हटके Prompt; सोशल मीडियावर धुमाकूळ
articles.author: Meenal Dinesh Gangurde
articles.summary: Google Gemini is trending by allowing users to upload photos and transform them using prompts on its website. Users can describe the desired look, style, or colors in detail to generate customized images. Google Gemini provides the facility to create various images from single image by using text prompts.

articles.title: 🌱 Fayetteville honors visionary mayor with new monument
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network and has been recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest.

articles.title: Woolworths upgrades popular range months after $20 Aldi item sells out: Cutest little things'
articles.author: Tom Flanagan
articles.summary: Woolworths is expanding its mini Woolworths Supermarket range for 2025 with an upgraded trolley priced at $40 and a new product called the Woolworths Light and Sound truck. The range, starting at $10, will be available in approximately 1,000 stores and includes various supermarket-themed toys and accessories.

articles.title: Ex-Dialog Digital Chief Gazzaly Joins Forces with DC Group Founders to Launch AI-Driven Marketing Company
articles.summary: DAT – The AI Company has officially launched as Sri Lanka's first data, AI, and technology-first marketing agency. Founded by Gazzaly, Arjun, and Prasad, DAT aims to bring AI-powered marketing to Sri Lanka and offer scalable brand solutions globally. The company offers services like AI-powered brand strategy, automated CRM, and building cultural moments with tech.

articles.title: Xiaomi bursts the price of its best -selling projector with Google TV, compatible with 4K and up to 120 inches
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the Smart Projector L1 Pro, priced under €300, offering Full HD resolution and 4K content playback. It features AI-powered setup, Google TV integration, and is available for purchase from the official Xiaomi store.

articles.title: McDonald's announced on the 15th that it will release two new menus, 'Pepperoni Double Pizza Burger'..
articles.author: A Whimsical Lake
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching two new menu items: the 'Pepperoni Double Pizza Burger' and the 'Pepperoni Mega Pizza Burger.' These burgers combine pizza and burger flavors with beef patties, pepperoni, and pizza sauce, available in two sizes: 'Double' and 'Mega'. McDonald's has selected NCT's Mark as the advertising model and will launch campaigns on TV and SNS to target younger customers.

articles.title: Hello To Pop Tarts
articles.author: John Amato
articles.summary: On September 14, 1964, Kellogg's Company launched the Pop-Tart. This portable breakfast treat became a popular anytime snack and redefined the breakfast food market.

articles.title: StarHub Launches First-of-Its Kind 'Dynamic Ad Pods', Real-Time Ad Replacement on Live TV
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: StarHub has launched Dynamic Ad Pods, a new service in Singapore that replaces ads in live broadcast TV channels with personalized messages. This service, developed with Hoppr, uses CTV Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI) technology to deliver targeted ads to different households watching the same live broadcast. Dynamic Ad Pods offer flexible ad formats and extend campaigns across digital channels.

articles.title: StarHub Launches First-of-Its Kind 'Dynamic Ad Pods', Real-Time Ad Replacement on Live TV
articles.summary: StarHub launched Dynamic Ad Pods, a solution replacing live broadcast TV ads with personalized messages. Hong Leong Finance (HLF) has officially launched HLF Digital, a mobile app that empowers customers to manage their finances with ease, convenience and security.

articles.title: Singapore Celebrity and Caltex Brand Ambassador Ayden Sng Marks Third Year of Partnership with 'Ayden's Pit Stop' Pop-Up at Caltex Holland
articles.summary: Chevron Singapore markets the Caltex brand and its retail network includes 26 service stations in Singapore. These stations offer products like Caltex with Techron petrol, Caltex Diesel with Techron D, and Havoline motor oil. Caltex service stations also accept CaltexGO mobile payments for fuel purchases.

articles.title: Myntra and Sugar Cosmetics launch Molten Beauty to target Gen Z consumers
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Myntra and Sugar Cosmetics have partnered to launch Molten Beauty, a new skincare and makeup brand targeting young Indian consumers. The brand's debut range, launched before Myntra's Big Fashion Festival, will expand to over 50 SKUs in the next year.

articles.title: High-Powered Android 16 Smartphone Unveiled: 512 GB Storage and Exceptional Performance Features
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, offering a discount on its 512GB version, which features a 6.7-inch OLED display, Samsung Exynos 2400 processor, and a 4,900 mAh battery. The Nova X smartphone, running Android 16, has also been unveiled, boasting a Kryo 990 Octa-Core processor, up to 1TB of storage, a 6.9-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, and a 200MP main camera sensor.

articles.title: What is in McDonald's Gold Sauce? These are the key ingredients
articles.author: Nbc Chicago Staff
articles.summary: McDonald's launched a limited-time 'Special Edition Gold Sauce' on September 3rd. This sauce is described as a blend of vinegary North Carolina BBQ sauce with honey, smoke, and mustard notes and is featured in new chicken items like the Special Edition Gold Snack Wrap and Bacon Special Edition Gold McCrispy Sandwiches.

articles.title: Australian new-car buyers sitting on the fence when it comes to EVs, says VW
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Volkswagen launched ID.4 and ID.5 this year. The company was prepared for fragmentation due to the launch of the product.

articles.title: 21 Personal Care Products For Issues You'd Rather Hide
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Cosrx introduces a hypoallergenic peptide toner containing hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and amino acids. Secret releases a clinical-strength deodorant providing 72 hours of sweat and odor protection. Anua launches a pore-control heartleaf extract cleansing oil, designed to remove dirt, makeup, and blackheads.

articles.title: Recently, Seongsu-dong, Seoul, has become a sacred place for a pop-up store in the banking sector (a..
articles.author: Kim Jung-Hwan
articles.summary: NH Nonghyup Bank launched a pop-up store "All One Town" at its gallery cafe. Hana Bank partnered with GS25 to create "Seongsu Sweet Factory," which offered limited-edition drinks. These pop-up stores are designed to promote brands and induce app access by offering entertainment and brand experience to the MZ generation.

articles.title: 29 Amazon Hidden Gems You'll Fall In Love With
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Nyx introduces the "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm with a flexible applicator and buildable formula. Maybelline launches Lifter Glaze Oil Balm, a moisturizing lip balm with a tint and hyaluronic acid. Londontown Kur releases Instant Smudge Fix for nails.

articles.title: Good market scents
articles.author: Joey Concepcion
articles.summary: Bon Voyage, a perfume business started by Gab Reyes and Alonso Lim, with Bella taking over creative direction and marketing, has launched its own perfume collection. The collection features three fragrances designed to be mixed and matched, offering customers an affordable and personalized scent experience tailored to the Gen Z market. Bon Voyage emphasizes creating a signature scent that reflects the wearer's lifestyle and identity.

articles.title: VEJA Taps NewStore, SAP, and Syntax to Power Global Unified Commerce Strategy
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: VEJA, a French footwear brand, has implemented the NewStore Unified Commerce Platform to enhance its omnichannel operations. This includes a seamless SAP ERP integration facilitated by Syntax. VEJA aims to modernize store operations with speed and reliability using NewStore.

articles.title: Brew York releases its 'most daring release yet' inspired by classic horror games
articles.author: York Press
articles.summary: Brew York released a new product, which the company has branded its most daring release yet.

articles.title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5: The name, the power, the why (Qualcomm Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Snapdragon introduces Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, the newest addition to its premium mobile platform range. The company reserves the 'Elite' designation for its most advanced products, highlighting capabilities, experiences, and innovations.

articles.title: Native Markets To Test Hyperliquid's USDH Within Days After Win
articles.author: Inside Bitcoins
articles.summary: Native Markets is testing Hyperliquid's USDH. This trial suggests a potential introduction or assessment of a new product or service within the cryptocurrency domain.

articles.title: Show off your Nintendo Switch 2 with these jaw-dropping games
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Nintendo has released the Nintendo Switch 2 console. The console's game library is expanding, with high-profile games like Pokémon Legends: Z-A becoming available.

articles.title: 'Darkest before the light': These investors think AI can lift VC out of its consumer ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: VCs are optimistic that OpenAI's ChatGPT can open new opportunities for consumer AI, which is causing investors to raise new funds. The expectation is that AI will revitalize consumer tech investing.
